articles.author: Sarah Martin
articles.title: More than 75% of Australians support compulsory Covid vaccines for aged care staff - The Guardian
articles.description: Australia Institute survey comes as government warms to idea of mandating jabs for workers in contact with vulnerable people
articles.content:
Health
More than three-quarters of Australians support a mandatory Covid-19 vaccine for frontline workers in aged care and other vulnerable settings, a new survey from the Australia Institute shows.… [+4845 chars]

articles.title: Car Crashes Into Japanese Arcade, Thankfully No One Was Hurt - Kotaku Australia
articles.description: Last week in Hiroshima, a sedan plowed into an arcade at a little after 9 pm, knocking over a row of bicycles and smashing through glass. The game centre was still in operation, and fortunately, no one in the car or arcade was hurt. In the above image from FN…

articles.title: Victoria records four new cases of Covid-19 - RNZ

articles.title: Thousands of train users on Perth to Mandurah line face month-long shutdown - The West Australian
articles.description: Tens of thousands of commuters on Perth’s busiest railway line have been encouraged to take a January holiday — or make plans to find another way into the CBD during a month-long shut down.
